TopicTitle: Hello all, I bring a gift!

Articles.Content:
Hello all Kerbal Space Program addicts. I bought/preordered/whatever KSP last week after getting hooked on the demo. And now, your gift. I took this picture and many more from the parking lot of my work building this morning. There must have been at least 100 of us watching Discovery do it\'s Victory Lap around the DC metro area. Now I have to go find a good space shuttle addon for KSP.

Discovery-firstpass6-small by Michael Janowich, on Flickr

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Greetings fellow Washingtonian, great photo!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Welcome to the KSP forums. Have fun, enjoy your stay.
